content: Set terminal title for implementation
Add SchemaProcessing error variant to error.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after error variant
Make schema field private in MutationPathContext
Add require_schema helper method to MutationPathContext
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after context changes
Update 5 call sites to use ctx.require_schema()
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after call site updates
Add properties logging to StructMutationBuilder
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix clippy issues following warning rules
Change MutationPathBuilder trait to return Result
Update TypeKind::build_paths impl to return Result and propagate
Update ArrayMutationBuilder to return Result
Update EnumMutationBuilder to return Result
Update StructMutationBuilder to return Result
Update TupleMutationBuilder to return Result
Update DefaultMutationBuilder to return Result
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after Result refactor
Add error handling to TypeInfo::build_mutation_paths
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after error handling
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix final clippy issues
Run cargo nextest run
STOP if test failures - review with user
Subagent: STOP and return control
Main: Task new subagent for code review
Review suggestions with user
